panels.description: A weighted score over the selected timeframe taking into account all new errors, regressions and slowdowns. Weights are defined in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Reliability Score

panels.description: The ratio between selected transaction volume and the number of $transactionFailureTypes which deem the call to be unstable.
panels.title: Failed Transactions

panels.description: The number of selected transactions whose avg time has increased by more than the critical slowdown threshold (as defined in the Settings dashboard) compared to the baseline period.
panels.title: Slow Transactions

panels.description: The number of new errors detected in the selected timeframe.
panels.title: New Errors

panels.description: Errors whose rate (i.e. times / calls) has increased the most. The thresholds to control what is considered an increase are available via the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Error Increases

panels.description: The number of unique errors of selected types: $type
panels.title: Unique Errors

panels.description: The response time of the selected transactions overlaid on the number of calls (throughput) into them.
panels.title: Average Response

panels.description: See errors in key code tiers. Key code tiers can be defined in the Settings dashboard. If no key tiers are defined, then the code tiers with the most errors are shown as defined by: https://git.io/fpPT0
panels.title: Errors By Tier

panels.description: The number of new errors detected in the current timeframe. P1 marks events that exceeded min thresholds, or whose type is defined in the critical exception types list. Both values are editable via the Settings dashboard.

styles.linkTooltip: ${__cell_1} in ${__cell_2}, introduced by ${__cell_3}: Click for root cause
${__cell_1} in ${__cell_2}, introduced by ${__cell_3}: Click for root cause

panels.title: New Errors

panels.description: List transaction that have experienced a number of call calls taking more than the avg + stddev in the baseline timeframe (defined in the Settings dashboard).
panels.title: Slowdowns

panels.description: Errors whose rate (i.e. times / calls) has increased the most. The thresholds to control what is considered an increase are available via the Settings dashboard.

styles.linkTooltip: ${__cell_1} in ${__cell_2}, introduced by ${__cell_3}: Click for root cause

panels.title: Increasing Errors
